verses.verse: Forasmuch <WG1895> as many <WG4183> have taken in hand <WG2021> to draw up <WG392> a narrative <WG1335> concerning <WG4012> those matters <WG4229> which have been fulfilled <WG4135> among <WG1722> us <WG2254>,

it seemed good <WG1380> to me also <WG2504>, having traced <WG3877> the course <WG3877> of all things <WG3956> accurately <WG199> from the first <WG509>, to write <WG1125> unto thee <WG4671> in order <WG2517>, most excellent <WG2903> Theophilus <WG2321>;
that <WG2443> thou mightest know <WG1921> the certainty <WG803> concerning <WG4012> the things <WG3056> wherein <WG3739> thou wast instructed <WG2727>.

And <WG2532> he came in <WG1525> unto <WG4314> her <WG846>, and said <WG2036>, Hail <WG5463>, thou that art highly favored <WG5487>, the Lord <WG2962> is with <WG3326> thee <WG4675>.
